description: Proposed works: Erection of a mansard roof extension; rear infill extension; roof terrace; and ASHP.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3616465e-7fff-fb74-9b27-cb69a72a9909"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The proposed roof terrace, by reason of its size and location, would create an unacceptable level of overlooking and loss of privacy for the adjoining occupiers. Accordingly, the terrace is contrary to policy D3 (Optimising site layout through the design-led approach) of the London Plan (2021), policy LP2 (Development and Amenity) of LP33 (2020), and the guidance set out in Hackney's Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2009).</span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-0c780854-7fff-7225-ec4c-3288b08e5599"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The proposed detailed design and fenestration pattern of the mansard roof extension, the roof terrace and associated structures, and the air source heat pump are considered inappropriate, obtrusive, and unsympathetic additions to the host building that fail to reflect the original architecture and character of the building and the terrace that it forms part of.
